c1.name: A Lingering Flavor
c1.descriptionRaw: Regenerates 15 Energy for Diona after the effects of <color=#FFD780FF>Signature Mix</color> end.
c1.description: Regenerates 15 Energy for Diona after the effects of Signature Mix end.

c2.name: Shaken, Not Purred
c2.descriptionRaw:
Increases <color=#FFD780FF>Icy Paws</color>' DMG by 15%, and increases its shield's DMG Absorption by 15%.
Additionally, when paws hit their targets, creates a shield for other nearby characters on the field with 50% of the <color=#FFD780FF>Icy Paws</color> shield's DMG Absorption for 5s.
c2.description:

Additionally, when paws hit their targets, creates a shield for other nearby characters on the field with 50% of the Icy Paws shield's DMG Absorption for 5s.

c3.name: A—Another Round?
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Signature Mix</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Signature Mix by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Wine Industry Slayer
c4.descriptionRaw: Within the radius of <color=#FFD780FF>Signature Mix</color>, Diona's charge time for aimed shots is reduced by 60%
c4.description: Within the radius of Signature Mix, Diona's charge time for aimed shots is reduced by 60%

c5.name: Double Shot, on the Rocks
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Icy Paws</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Icy Paws by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Cat's Tail Closing Time
c6.descriptionRaw:
Characters within <color=#FFD780FF>Signature Mix</color>'s radius will gain the following effects based on their HP amounts:
·Increases Incoming Healing Bonus by 30% when HP falls below or is equal to 50%.
·Elemental Mastery increased by 200 when HP is above 50%.
